display_long_description:
# Welcome to The Cooking Simulator - Pizza Shop VR Game! 

**Sauce Gun Showdown**

You're in the heat of the kitchen — the customer wants extra sauce, and you're armed with the Sauce Gun. Blast sauces like you're cooking a masterpiece, all while keeping up with incoming orders.
[media]

**BoomBox Beats**

Cooking's better with music. With your new BoomBox, you can drop beats while spinning dough. Customers groove, toppings fly, and the kitchen turns into a full-blown pizza rave.
[media]

**Cheese Bomb Explosion**

Say goodbye to boring pizza toppings. Drop a Cheese Bomb, watch the mozzarella fly, and make your pizzas explode with flavor. It’s a mess — and a masterpiece.
[media]

**Purchase & Upgrade Station**

You earned some dough — now it’s time to shop. Head to your in-game upgrade station, buy crazy new gear, and take your pizza shop to the next level.
[media]

# Welcome to The Cooking Simulator - Pizza Shop VR Game! 

**Sauce Gun Showdown**

You're in the heat of the kitchen — the customer wants extra sauce, and you're armed with the Sauce Gun. Blast sauces like you're cooking a masterpiece, all while keeping up with incoming orders.

**BoomBox Beats**

Cooking's better with music. With your new BoomBox, you can drop beats while spinning dough. Customers groove, toppings fly, and the kitchen turns into a full-blown pizza rave.
![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/491821746_1220244573311661_7552835151381331500_n.mp4?_nc_cat=101&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=BgnCLpKPYkUQ7kNvwFe8nDw&_nc_oc=AdlsSiLVcHuYqNQ-H3vJSTgkHzYkUREBpD1R1KmJB3jssdbuIN3jXDatwbz-q1wlFWM&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=LLYkhjrrHStXPP9goj54SQ&oh=00_Afs0bOvbasuqBa-KAo1T3ClZpnfz9vyyTBBIzTR_1pFGuQ&oe=69949F22)

**Cheese Bomb Explosion**

Say goodbye to boring pizza toppings. Drop a Cheese Bomb, watch the mozzarella fly, and make your pizzas explode with flavor. It’s a mess — and a masterpiece.
![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/499303976_1357398442246024_5112231943563955803_n.mp4?_nc_cat=110&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=uzhTw0u77SoQ7kNvwFh9WrH&_nc_oc=AdmO3FQZva2DBbnfdZa9fmYKjlqwkqjVxV0GGB_qTrHK_cvU63_ChItrmXZQBZxZQJo&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=LLYkhjrrHStXPP9goj54SQ&oh=00_Aft7PoD_lnrot6UXIaKa0W8eB0ND9Ly47VBWrDbOgs4b4A&oe=6994C04F)

**Purchase & Upgrade Station**

You earned some dough — now it’s time to shop. Head to your in-game upgrade station, buy crazy new gear, and take your pizza shop to the next level.
